translation.en: You sure you don't wanna use the variable scope for this?
translation.es: ¿En serio no quieres usar la mira variable?

translation.en: No. I've got a lock on vector and trajectory.
translation.es: No. Ya fijé vector y trayectoria.

translation.en: You ever hear that saying, Listen to your elders?
translation.es: ¿No conoces el dicho Escucha a tus mayores?

translation.en: Big phrase, especially here in Japan.
translation.es: Es una máxima importante, más aquí en Japón.

translation.en: Elder doesn't necessarily mean old. It just means older.
translation.es: Mayor no es sinónimo de viejo. Significa más grande que tú.

translation.en: But hey, I'm serious. We blow this chance, it's seven years--
translation.es: En serio. Si perdemos esta oportunidad, serán siete…

translation.en: Seven years of hard work down the drain.
translation.es: Siete años de esfuerzo tirados a la basura.

translation.en: Ah, so you do listen to me.
I haven't missed once in 12 years.
See? And you say I only think about the work.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Y dices que solo pienso en el trabajo.

translation.en: Code five on- site. Code five.
Hold on. There's a kid here.
The window is closing. I repeat, take the shot, Seasonal.
translation.es: La ventana se cierra. Repito, dispare, Seasonal.

translation.en: I've thought about this a long time.
What happened in Osaka shouldn't have.
translation.es: Lo de Osaka no debió suceder.
Una regla sencilla. Nada de niños.

translation.en: I mean, this ain't your first rodeo.
You know there's collateral damage. You know that.
translation.es: Existe el daño colateral, lo sabes.

translation.en: Almost to the head of the snake.
translation.es: Casi llegamos a la cabeza de la serpiente.

translation.en: Look, I promised I'd finish the job, and I will.
translation.es: Prometí terminar el trabajo. Y eso haré.

translation.en: You know, I never had one.
- Picket fence? Dogs? Suburbs? - I don't know.
Two trips to Walmart, you'll be back.
translation.es: Dos visitas a Walmart, y volverás.

translation.en: You haven't even touched your Merlot.
I'm sorry, that was a total pick- up line.
translation.es: Perdón, fue un intento de seducción.

translation.en: The worst way to start a conversation is a Hey.
translation.es: El peor abordaje es un Hola.

translation.en: It's boring, it's dull. It's for horses.
translation.es: Es aburrido, es tonto. Es infantil.

translation.en: Shibuya- ku Sendagaya 4- 7- 11. Shibuya- ku Sendagaya 4- 7- 11.
Main entrance, two black sedans. Single.
translation.es: Entrada principal, dos sedanes negros. Único.

translation.en: - New point. - Negative. You are red.
- New point. - The window is closed.
Now you start the rest of your life
translation.es: Ahora comienza el resto de tu vida.

translation.en: That makes me your mother, your father, your best friend,
translation.es: Eso me convierte en tu madre, tu padre, tu mejor amigo

translation.en: Left. That all you got? Left.
You've been out almost a day.
Have you had any recent exposure to radioactive materials?
translation.es: ¿Se ha expuesto últimamente a materiales radiactivos?

translation.en: The reason I ask is you appear to be suffering from accelerated ARS.
translation.es: Se lo pregunto porque parece sufrir un SIA acelerado.

translation.en: Caused by subjection to potent radiation in…
translation.es: Causado por la exposición a radiación potente

translation.en: it appears to be more specific.
We'll take the Margaux to go.
How much time do I have?
- But we will make it painless for you. -
Five liters of blood in the body, heart pumps two a minute.
translation.es: Cinco litros de sangre. Se bombean dos por minuto.

translation.en: Gun's on your femoral. You do the math.
I need something to keep me going.
These. Load them in the shots, go.
translation.es: Estos. Cárguelos en las jeringas. Ya.

translation.en: I don't have all the time in the world.
What are you trying to do?
Shibuya- ku Sendagaya. Shibuya- ku Sendagaya.
- …take a shower. - We should just have fun!
- It's the last night. Come on! - I know.
But I still have stuff to do.
What are you talking about? Poison?
They told me it was just a roofie, so they could lift the room.
translation.es: Dijeron que era un sedante para poder revisar tu cuarto.

translation.en: Even if I knew, I'd be dead if I tell you.
translation.es: No sé, pero me matarán si te digo.

translation.en: - Aw, she'll be dead if you don't. - Wait.
translation.es: - Dime, o la mato a ella. - Espera.

translation.en: Kazuo Sato. He manages a Yakuza club.
translation.es: Kazuo Sato. Administra un club de la yakuza.

translation.en: Sato said that if he did this one last thing,
translation.es: Pero Sato dijo que si lo hacía,

translation.en: that he would set us free.
We could actually start over now.
And it seems we're the same.
And they're gonna know I was here.
That's what I'm trying to figure out.
You won't get any more questions from me after today.
translation.es: Después de hoy, no te haré más preguntas.

translation.en: Grand honcho of the biggest family in Tokyo.
translation.es: Un capo de la familia más poderosa de Tokio.

translation.en: Your mark in Osaka was Kijima's younger brother, Kentaro.
translation.es: Tu blanco de Osaka fue el hermano menor de Kijima, Kentaro.

translation.en: I won't lie, it's been a shitshow for us as it's been for you, and…
translation.es: No te mentiré. Para nosotros también ha sido una mierda.

translation.en: Kijima, apparently, who hasn't been able to let it go.
translation.es: Y según parece, Kijima no ha podido superarlo.
¿Fue en venganza por lo de Osaka?

translation.en: Some people have this extraordinary attachment to their siblings,
translation.es: Hay gente que siente un apego extraordinario por sus hermanos,

translation.en: as if genetics make a family and…
translation.es: como si la genética definiera la familia y…

translation.en: Anyway, all that honor shit, Kijima's been on a tear against the…
translation.es: En fin, por toda esa mierda del honor, Kijima se la tiene jurada a…

translation.en: How do I get to him?

translation.es: No después de lo de Osaka.

translation.en: Last night was a very rare opportunity.
translation.es: La de anoche fue una oportunidad muy rara.

translation.en: What about Sato? Kazuo Sato. Ring a bell?
I know that some of his guys hang out at a place called the Black Lizard.
translation.es: Sé que algunos de sus hombres van a un sitio llamado El lagarto negro.

translation.en: You don't tell me, I kill you.
translation.es: Si no me dice, lo mato.

translation.en: I think you're lying, I kill you.
translation.es: Si creo que miente, lo mato.

translation.en: How do I get to him?
- All right. Same question, same deal. -
- You killed him! He is the-- - He is dead. You worry about you.
translation.es: - ¡Lo mató! ¡Él…! - Está muerto. Preocúpese por usted.

translation.en: I'm gonna ask one more time.
What the fuck are you doing? Let go of me!
You're gonna call Kijima for me.
I can't. I don't have his number.
translation.es: No puedo. No tengo su número.

translation.en: Oh, you don't have his number? Really?
Kijima, yeah, I don't have his number!
- How do you reach him? - Okay, who are you?
How do you get in touch with him?
I don't know, I just call ano baka Renji.

translation.es: ¿A Renji? ¡Es su consejero, no es estúpido!

translation.en: The only person that talks to him.
translation.es: Es la única persona que habla con él.
¿Ani? Renji, acaba de secuestrarme una extranjera gigante. ¡Esta mujer…!

translation.en: I got the kid. If Kijima wants to see her again,
translation.es: La tengo yo. Si Kijima quiere volver a verla,

translation.en: he can meet me at the center of Murakawa marketplace in one hour.
translation.es: que vaya al centro del mercado Murakawa en una hora.

translation.en: - A second more and she dies. - Who is this?
translation.es: - Un segundo más, y muere. - ¿Quién habla?

translation.en: You think you can… You can't get to him this way.
translation.es: Crees que podrás… Así no llegarás a él.

translation.en: He doesn't give a shit about me.
And you know, for your information,
I haven't talked or seen my uncle in, like, a year.
translation.es: no hablo ni veo a mi tío desde hace un año.

translation.en: Ew, what the fuck? Oh, my God, what is wrong with you?
translation.es: ¿Qué carajo es eso? Por Dios, ¿qué te pasa?

translation.en: Yeah, no way. You're all gross and sick.
translation.es: Sí, ni loca. Estás enferma y das asco.

translation.en: Hey, I have to go to the bathroom.
You got any Boom Boom Lemon?
Ugh! I can barely breathe in here.
So many scars and blood. It's so…
translation.es: Tantas cicatrices, tanta sangre. Es tan…

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing, bitch?
This will keep you safe. Trust me.
Let me see the child first.
translation.es: Antes, quiero ver a la niña.

translation.en: Either Kijima walks out right now,
translation.es: O Kijima se presenta aquí ya mismo,

translation.en: or I leave and you never see the kid alive again.
translation.es: o me voy, y no vuelven a ver viva a la niña.
¿Qué haces? Vas a reencontrarte con tu padre,

translation.en: - You better get out of here. - Wait!
You're just gonna leave me, then?
Kijima didn't show. You're useless to me now.
translation.es: Kijima no vino. Ya no me sirves.

translation.en: Did you see what just happened?
My own family wants me gone. Where the fuck will I go?
translation.es: Mi familia me quiere muerta. ¿Adónde carajo voy?

translation.en: I'll be dead before the night's over.
Hey, that makes two of us.
Why did you save me, then, huh?
You… you're a… No! You can't abandon me.
I know Kijima killed my dad, and he will kill me.
translation.es: Sé que Kijima mató a mi papá, y me matará a mí.

translation.en: What did I do wrong, huh?
I haven't done anything to anybody, but they still treat me like shit!
translation.es: ¡No le hice nada a nadie, pero me tratan para la mierda!

translation.en: Everybody, all the time, just throwing me around,
translation.es: Todos, todo el tiempo, me lanzan de aquí para allá,

translation.en: like I'm some piece of garbage.
translation.es: como si fuera una bolsa de basura.

translation.en: You don't know what you're talking about.
You just yap, yap, yap. Just fuck this, fuck that.
translation.es: Parloteas sin parar. Repites carajo, mierda.

translation.en: You don't know anything! You're a kid!
Are you gonna go kill him?
You'll need me, you know. Like…
You won't make it an hour without my help, okay?
translation.es: No resistirás ni una hora sin mi ayuda.

translation.en: And I can do everything, okay?
I know who, where, when, whatever.
- I can help you get him, get my uncle. - Okay.
translation.es: Puedo ayudarte a llegar a mi tío.

translation.en: And I'm really good at shortcuts and maps and…
translation.es: Soy buena con los atajos, los mapas y…

translation.en: You can't walk around like this.

translation.es: ¿Boom Boom Lemon? Es una porquería artificial.

translation.en: You know what? This is stupid. Let's go.

translation.es: La ropa limpia es una estupidez.

translation.en: Everything I should wear should be just covered in blood.
translation.es: Todo lo que uso debe estar empapado de sangre.

translation.en: Aw, it's so cute on you.
But you're also a Terminator, bitch.
translation.es: Pero también eres una Terminator, perra.

translation.en: We're actually pretty much the same.
Who has a line into Kijima?

translation.es: Era el puesto de mi papá.

translation.en: It's this fucking cool penthouse, top of the tower.
- The entire floor is theirs. - Security?
I mean, two in the lobby, at least.
translation.es: Dos en el vestíbulo, por lo menos.
Por atrás, junto a la cocina.

translation.en: We could just shoot our ways in.
No. I have to get to him before he knows what's wrong.
translation.es: No. Debo llegar a él antes de que reaccione.

translation.en: We'll be fast, okay? Bang, bang! Brrap!  You're dead--
Stop. Speak less, open your ears.
translation.es: Alto. Habla menos y escucha más.

translation.en: By being you. Just, you know, louder.
What do you want from Renji- san?
Of course it is my concern.
Your concern is to stay whole until I leave here.
translation.es: Te concierne seguir entero hasta que me vaya.

translation.en: You may do to me what you must.
But I will not be disclosing his whereabouts.
- Shit, there's one remote for everything. -
translation.es: Mierda, hay un control para todo.

translation.en: There's blood on my face. There's blood.
- No. No, stop it. Stop it! Stop! - Hey. Look at me.
Look only at me, okay? Look only at me and breathe.
translation.es: Mírame. Concéntrate en mí y respira.

translation.en: Okay? You're gonna live through this.
Hey, maybe we should check this house, huh?
- Hey, I think I know where Renji is. - Yeah?
translation.es: Creo que sé dónde está Renji. ¿Sí?

translation.en: I can see exactly where Renji is and where he will be.
translation.es: Puedo ver exactamente dónde está Renji y dónde estará.

translation.en: I gotta be honest, I'm having a rough night.
translation.es: Seré sincera. Tengo una noche difícil.

translation.en: I really need to see your boss Kijima.
translation.es: Me urge ver a tu jefe, Kijima.
Mi familia mató a mi padre.

translation.en: All of you asshole hyenas getting fat off of my dad's carcass!
translation.es: ¡Todos ustedes, hienas carroñeras que devoraron el cadáver de mi papá!

translation.en: Just give him to me, and you'll live. Okay?
When he disappears like this, he says, To be amongst family.
translation.es: Cuando desaparece así, dice: Para estar con la familia.

translation.en: I don't know what it means.
translation.es: No sé a qué se refiere.

translation.en: I found him. I found Kijima.
Hey, I promised you, didn't I?
Kate, tell me where you are, I'll come to you right now.
translation.es: Kate, dime dónde estás. Iré a buscarte ya mismo.

translation.en: Don't. I'll already be dead anyway.
You can find my body near a house in Hottazaka.
translation.es: Busca mi cuerpo cerca de la casa Hottazaka.

translation.en: I don't know anything about you.
Do you wanna know about me?
But I'm the last person you'll get to know.
translation.es: Pero soy la última persona que conocerás.
Mi mamá también es una gaijin.

translation.en: That's why I've never met her.
I don't know what she looks like.
She was like you, I bet.
No shit from no dudes. Just doing what she wants all the time.
translation.es: No se deja pisotear por ningún tipo. Hace lo que se le antoja.

translation.en: It's the old family house. No one really knows about it.
translation.es: Es la antigua casa familiar. Nadie sabe de ella.

translation.en: Hey, look at you. You can't stand, and you can't see.
translation.es: Mírate. No te mantienes en pie, no ves.

translation.en: - I'm here now. I'm coming with you. - No, you're not.
translation.es: - Ahora estoy aquí. Voy contigo. - No.

translation.en: Why not? I go where you go.

translation.es: Libérate un poco de esa ira.

translation.en: Take control of your own life.
translation.es: Toma el control de tu vida.

translation.en: You know, I thought I had the coolest bracelets.
translation.es: Creí que yo tenía los mejores brazaletes.

translation.en: I realize now, you have the coolest bracelet.
translation.es: Pero veo que tú tienes el mejor.

translation.en: I have a gun, you know.
Yeah, you don't know shit about my parents,
translation.es: Sí, no sabes nada sobre mis padres,

translation.en: Well, I know it couldn't have been easy to lose 'em.
translation.es: Sé que no habrá sido fácil perderlos.

translation.en: You know, I lost someone that I love a lot.
translation.es: Yo perdí a alguien a quien quiero mucho.

translation.en: I didn't know Kate had any stupid friends.
translation.es: No sabía que Kate tenía amiguitos.

translation.en: Well, she's got you, doesn't she?
She and I aren't really friends, more family.
translation.es: Ella y yo no somos amigos, somos familia.

translation.en: Have you ever wondered about Kate's obsession with your family?
translation.es: ¿No te preguntaste por qué Kate está obsesionada con tu familia?

translation.en: I know you've been through a lot.
Kate ever share with you what she did in Osaka when she first met you?
translation.es: ¿Kate no te contó lo que hizo en Osaka la primera vez que te vio?

translation.en: I'm dying. I have to finish… I have to finish something.
Death is the time for the beginnings.
translation.es: La muerte es la hora de nuevos comienzos.

translation.en: - Ani-- - You killed my whole family.
translation.es: - Ani… - Mataste a toda mi familia.

translation.en: Shoot me if you want, but don't get in that car, okay?
translation.es: Dispárame si quieres, pero no subas a ese auto.

translation.en: Look at me. I'm begging you.
You're stronger than I am. You don't have to end up here--
translation.es: Eres más fuerte que yo. No tienes que acabar aquí…

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! I have nothing left, okay?
translation.es: ¡Cierra la boca, carajo! ¡No me queda nada!

translation.en: It's what they do. You and me, we're collateral--
translation.es: Es lo que hacen. Tú y yo somos daño…

translation.en: you start the rest of your life.
translation.es: comienza el resto de tu vida.

translation.en: You start the rest of your life.
translation.es: Comienza el resto de tu vida.

translation.en: I know how much you must be hurting right now, losing your parents.
translation.es: Sé cuánto te debe doler haber perdido a tus padres.

translation.en: Shoot 'em in the stomach, they die slow, in agony.
translation.es: Si les disparas al estómago, la muerte es lenta, agónica.

translation.en: Are you gonna let that pain overwhelm you?
She's the future. Mine at least.
translation.es: Es el futuro. Al menos, el mío.

translation.en: You went after my girl without my permission.
translation.es: Atacaste a mi chica sin mi permiso.

translation.en: I could fucking kill you right now.
translation.es: Tengo muchas ganas de matarte, carajo.

translation.en: My issue is not with my operation.
It's with you taking it on yourself.
translation.es: Lo que no me gusta es que tú tomes decisiones solo.

translation.en: If she's leaving, I will terminate her.
I just had to work it.
She would have changed her mind.
I would have changed my mind.
That was always the deal, Varrick- san.
translation.es: Ese fue siempre el trato, Varrick-san.

translation.en: After Kentaro's death, all eyes were on me.
translation.es: Tras la muerte de Kentaro, todo apuntaba a mí.

translation.en: I panicked. I moved too quickly, and I'm sorry.
translation.es: Entré en pánico. Me apresuré. Lo lamento.

translation.en: You know what? You blundered, I blundered.
translation.es: Tú metiste la pata, yo metí la pata.

translation.en: Maybe we do our best to put this behind us.
translation.es: Hagamos lo posible por dejar esto en el pasado.

translation.en: In the name of being human.
I can't say I can trust you going forward.
translation.es: No creo que vuelva a confiar en ti.

translation.en: Trust was not a part of the deal.
translation.es: La confianza no era parte del trato.

translation.en: Welcome to the Yakuza, Varrick- san.
Alpha- six, camera two is down. I repeat, camera two is down.
translation.es: Alfa seis, cámara dos desactivada. Repito, cámara dos desactivada.

translation.en: Well, we, uh, call up the teams, form a barricade around the crystal box.
translation.es: Que los equipos formen una barricada en torno a la caja de cristal.

translation.en: And, uh, you know, we'll hole up in there. Move!
- Bring up the girl. - Copy that.
Okay, Renji. You ain't coming with.
You guys, come with me. Good luck.
to undo it, to take it all back.
translation.es: por deshacer todo lo que hice.

translation.en: Be nice, right now, for both of us, wouldn't it?
translation.es: Sería lindo para los dos en este momento, ¿no?

translation.en: Ani, I'd give anything to take it back. I'd take it all back. I'm so sorry.
translation.es: Daría lo que fuera por deshacerlo. Lo desharía todo. Perdón.

translation.en: But guess we gotta just accept who we are now.
translation.es: Pero tenemos que aceptar quiénes somos ahora.

translation.en: And you know, Kate, that we are…
Well, I was gonna say indispensable parts of a system.
translation.es: Iba a decir partes indispensables del sistema.
Uno sin lugar para el disenso.

translation.en: I promise you it is not what you think it is.
translation.es: Te juro que no es lo que crees.

translation.en: It turns out nothing ever was.
translation.es: Resulta que nada era lo que yo creía.

translation.en: And I'm not looking away anymore.
I see. In the 25th hour, you suddenly grew a conscience.
translation.es: Comprendo. A último minuto, decidiste que tienes principios.

translation.en: My entire fucking life, I never loved anyone, except you.
translation.es: En toda mi maldita vida, nunca amé a nadie, salvo a ti.

translation.en: We both know you only love yourself.
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que solo te amas a ti mismo.

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay. Go on. Okay.
